name: Smart Fish
description:
The ocean is full of smart fish, but no less smarter, it turns out to be an octopus that knocks down all the smart fish that managed to solve its riddles, but for this, you must first become smarter yourself!

Smart Fish - A game with the solution of mathematical problems, they become more difficult depending on the level of passage, the further you swim, the more difficult the tasks, and the limited time will make you hurry up with the decision!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Logic
- Difficulty
